alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Norfolk, southwestern Suffolk, southeastern Worcester and southeastern Middlesex Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Upton, or near Milford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Boston, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Brookline, Shrewsbury, Natick, Watertown, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Milton, Dedham, Belmont, Walpole, Canton, Westborough, Grafton and Sharon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk
